casebody.data:
(March 28, 1957)

(Republished)

In the Matter of John A. Radlanszky, Petitioner, against Police Commissioner of the Police Department of the City of New York, Respondent.

Determination ' unanimously annulled and petitioner restored to the position he occupied at the time of his dismissal as of the time of his dismissal. There is no substantial support in the evidence for the determination. Settle order on notice. Concur — Peck, P. J., Botein, Rabin, Frank and Yalente, JJ. [See ante, p. 742.]
